evidence.claim: RAVSoft Solutions uses AWS cloud services for hosting and scaling applications.
The company provides integration with healthcare standards like HIPAA and FHIR for secure data exchange.
RAVSoft Solutions supports EDI transaction sets, including X12 formats for healthcare data processing.
Their platform leverages Azure for data integration and service management.
They promote HIPAA-compliant solutions indicating a focus on regulatory standards.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of engagement with X12 transactions found.
